mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.PRODPLAN_DATE, A.PRODPLAN_SEQ, A.PRODWORK_SEQ, D.SEQ, D.WORK_SEQ) AS IDX, A.PRODPLAN_ID, A.PRODPLAN_DATE, A.PRODPLAN_SEQ, A.PRODWORK_SEQ, A.ORDER_FLAG, A.PRODPLAN_DATE AS WORKDT_DATE, A.ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE_ID, A2.MATERIAL_CODE AS ITEM_CODE, A2.UNIT AS ITEM_UNIT_ID, F.MAT_ITEM_SEQ AS PROD_CODE_ID, F1.MATERIAL_CODE AS PROD_CODE, F1.MATERIAL_NAME, F1.MATERIAL_SPEC, F2.CODE_NM AS MATERIAL_UNIT, F1.UNIT AS MATERIAL_UNIT_ID, D.WORK_CODE, D1.WORK_NAME, D.WORK_SEQ, D.SEQ AS PRODWORK_SEQ, CAST(D1.ERP_PROCESS_MAPPING AS INT) AS WORKCODE_ID, E1.EQUIP_SYS_CD AS EQUIPMENT_CODE, E1.EQUIPMENT_NAME, C.WORK_ORDER, C.WORK_ORDER_NM, D.LAST_FLAG, A.PROD_QTY AS ORDER_QTY, CAST(F.NEED_QTY_NUMERATOR/F.NEED_QTY_DENOMINATOR AS DECIMAL(19,2)) AS LABORCOST, ISNULL(A.BIGO, '') AS BIGO, A11.CUSTOMER_CODE, '' AS OPMAN_CODE2, '' AS OPTIME2, 0 AS RST_CNT, '' AS PRODORDER_ID, 0 AS ORDER_SEQ, D.SEQ AS TPR110D_SEQ FROM TPR301 A LEFT JOIN TPR301M A1 ON A.FACTORY_CODE = A1.FACTORY_CODE AND A.PRODPLAN_DATE = A1.PRODPLAN_DATE AND A.PRODPLAN_SEQ = A1.PRODPLAN_SEQ
LEFT JOIN TPR301R A11 ON A11.FACTORY_CODE = A1.FACTORY_CODE AND A11.PRODPLAN_DATE = A1.PRODPLAN_DATE AND A11.PRODPLAN_SEQ = A1.PRODPLAN_SEQ
LEFT JOIN TCO403 A2 ON A.ITEM_CODE = A2.MATERIAL_ID
LEFT JOIN TPR112 B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.PROD_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN TPR110 C ON B.FACTORY_CODE = C.FACTORY_CODE AND B.WORK_ORDER = C.WORK_ORDER
LEFT JOIN TPR110D D ON C.FACTORY_CODE = D.FACTORY_CODE AND C.WORK_ORDER = D.WORK_ORDER LEFT JOIN TPR102 D1 ON D.WORK_CODE = D1.WORK_CODE
LEFT JOIN TPR104 E ON D.WORK_CODE = E.WORK_CODE AND A.EQUIP_SYS_CD = E.EQUIP_SYS_CD LEFT JOIN TPR151 E1 ON E.EQUIP_SYS_CD = E1.EQUIP_SYS_CD
LEFT JOIN TCO501 F ON F.ITEM_SEQ = A.ITEM_CODE AND CAST(F.PROC_SEQ AS VARCHAR) = D.WORK_CODE LEFT JOIN TCO403 F1 ON MAT_ITEM_SEQ = F1.MATERIAL_ID LEFT JOIN MES_CCMMNDETAIL_CODE F2 ON F2.CODE_ID = 'COM007' AND F1.UNIT = F2.CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRODPLAN_DATE = #{prodplanDate} AND A.PRODPLAN_SEQ = #{prodplanSeq} AND A.PRODWORK_SEQ = #{prodworkSeq} ORDER BY A.PRODPLAN_DATE, CAST(A.PRODPLAN_SEQ AS INT), CAST(A.PRODWORK_SEQ AS INT), CAST(D.SEQ AS INT), CAST(D.WORK_SEQ AS INT)

SELECT A.PRODORDER_ID AS IDX, A.FACTORY_CODE, A.PRODPLAN_DATE, A.PRODPLAN_SEQ, A.PRODWORK_SEQ, A.WORK_SEQ AS ORDER_SEQ, A.WORKORDER_SEQ, A.WORK_CODE, B.WORK_NAME, CAST(B.ERP_PROCESS_MAPPING AS INT) AS WORKCODE_ID, D1.EQUIP_SYS_CD AS EQUIPMENT_CODE, D1.EQUIPMENT_NAME, A.WORKDT_DATE, A.ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE_ID, A1.MATERIAL_CODE AS ITEM_CODE, A1.UNIT AS ITEM_UNIT_ID, A.PROD_CODE AS PROD_CODE_ID, C.MATERIAL_CODE AS PROD_CODE, C.MATERIAL_NAME, C.MATERIAL_SPEC, C1.CODE_NM AS MATERIAL_UNIT, C.UNIT AS MATERIAL_UNIT_ID, A.ORDER_FLAG, A.LOT_NO, A.PROD_QTY AS ORDER_QTY, A.BIGO, E1.LAST_FLAG, ISNULL(A.OPMAN_CODE2, A.OPMAN_CODE) AS OPMAN_CODE2, ISNULL(A.OPTIME2, A.OPTIME) AS OPTIME2, A.PRODPLAN_ID, A.PRODORDER_ID, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TPR601 X WHERE A.FACTORY_CODE = X.FACTORY_CODE AND A.PRODPLAN_DATE = X.PRODPLAN_DATE AND A.PRODPLAN_SEQ = X.PRODPLAN_SEQ AND A.PRODWORK_SEQ = X.PRODWORK_SEQ AND A.WORK_SEQ = X.WORK_SEQ ) AS RST_CNT, A.TPR110D_SEQ, F.CUSTOMER_CODE FROM TPR504 A LEFT JOIN TCO403 A1 ON A.ITEM_CODE = A1.MATERIAL_ID
LEFT JOIN TPR102 B ON A.WORK_CODE = B.WORK_CODE
LEFT JOIN TCO403 C ON A.PROD_CODE = C.MATERIAL_ID LEFT JOIN MES_CCMMNDETAIL_CODE C1 ON C1.CODE_ID = 'COM007' AND C.UNIT = C1.CODE
LEFT JOIN TPR104 D ON A.WORK_CODE = D.WORK_CODE AND A.EQUIP_SYS_CD = D.EQUIP_SYS_CD
LEFT JOIN TPR151 D1 ON D.EQUIP_SYS_CD = D1.EQUIP_SYS_CD
LEFT JOIN TPR112 E ON E.PROD_CODE_ID = A.ITEM_CODE
LEFT JOIN TPR110D E1 ON E.WORK_ORDER = E1.WORK_ORDER AND A.WORK_CODE = E1.WORK_CODE AND A.TPR110D_SEQ = E1.SEQ
LEFT JOIN TPR301R F ON F.FACTORY_CODE = A.FACTORY_CODE AND F.PRODPLAN_DATE = A.PRODPLAN_DATE AND F.PRODPLAN_SEQ = A.PRODPLAN_SEQ
WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRODPLAN_DATE = #{prodplanDate} AND A.PRODPLAN_SEQ = #{prodplanSeq} AND A.PRODWORK_SEQ = #{prodworkSeq} AND ISNULL(A.DELETE_FLAG, 0) != 1 ORDER BY A.PRODPLAN_DATE, CAST(A.PRODPLAN_SEQ AS INT), CAST(PRODWORK_SEQ AS INT), CAST(WORKORDER_SEQ AS INT);

SELECT 'PO' + CONVERT(char(8), GETDATE(), 112) + RIGHT('0000' + CAST( ISNULL( MAX(CAST(RIGHT(TPR504ID, 4) AS INT)), 0 ) + 1 AS varchar), 4 ) AS NEXT_ID FROM TPR504 WHERE TPR504ID LIKE 'PO' + CONVERT(char(8), GETDATE(), 112) + '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TPR504( FACTORY_CODE, PRODPLAN_DATE, PRODPLAN_SEQ, PRODWORK_SEQ, WORK_SEQ, PRODPLAN_ID, PRODORDER_ID, WORKORDER_SEQ, WORK_CODE, WORKDT_DATE, ITEM_CODE, PROD_CODE, EQUIP_SYS_CD, ORDER_FLAG, LOT_NO, PROD_QTY, OPMAN_CODE, OPTIME, TPR504ID, BIGO, TPR110D_SEQ ) VALUES ( '000001', #{prodplanDate}, #{prodplanSeq}, #{prodworkSeq}, #{orderSeq}, #{prodplanId}, #{prodorderId}, #{newWorkorderSeq}, #{workCode}, #{workdtDate}, #{itemCodeId}, #{prodCodeId}, #{equipmentCode}, 'O', #{lotNo}, #{orderQty}, #{opmanCode}, GETDATE(), #{prodorderId}, #{bigo}, #{tpr110dSeq} );
